Title: Relates to certain educational requirements for public assistance
Summary: Relates to requiring participation in education programs leading to a high school diploma or high school equivalency diploma for those seeking public assistance.
LawCode: Amd ยง131, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring participation in educational programs leading to a high school diploma or high school equivalency diploma for those seeking public assistance
